CustomField.description: Users populate this optional field with the sum of any one-time fee amounts for treasury products being originated outside of nCino. By default, it isâ€¯blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populate this field with the sum of any one-time fees associated with treasury products an FI originates in the deal outside of nCino. Exclusive of recurring fees captured in New Monthly Treasury Income.
CustomField.label: New Treasury One Time Fee Amount
